summary: The family of an older man who runs a small sake brewery become concerned with his finances and his health after they discover him visiting an old mistress from his youth.
cast: Ganjirô Nakamura|Setsuko Hara|Yôko Tsukasa|Michiyo Aratama|Keiju Kobayashi|Masahiko Shimazu|Hisaya Morishige|Chieko Naniwa|Reiko Dan|Haruko Sugimura|Daisuke Katô|Haruko Tôgô|Yumi Shirakawa|Akira Takarada|Kyû Sazanka|Yû Fujiki|Chishû Ryû|Tatsuo Endô|Yûko Mochizuki|Asao Uchida
title: El otoño de la familia Kohayagawa
